document_data.caption: A map of Moray showing the Shannyth Forest in the south.
document_data.name: Shannyth Forest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shannyth Forest''' was a woodland found on the isle of [[Moray]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Shannyth Forest was located in southwest Moray. It was bordered on the south by the [[Orcskull Mountains]], on the east by the [[Shannyth River]], and on the west by the [[Trackless Sea]]. One of two [[moonwell]]s on Moray was found within the Shannyth Forest. The forest covered roughly {{SI|100|sq mi|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Activity: The villagers from nearby [[Farview]] harvested timber from the forest to construct fine [[longship]]s. [[Lycanthrope]]s from the [[Black Blood Tribe]] were drawn to the forest with the hopes of polluting the moonwell with live sacrifices. However, the equally savage [[northlander]]s of Farview were often more than a match for the lycanthropes, leaving the forest littered with corpses from both sides.{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|9}}
